title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for dW dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39AB@ at t = 0

1 point is earned for the answer

dW dt | t=0 = 1 25 (W(0)−300)= 1 25 (1400−300)=44 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5614@

The tangent line is y = 1400 + 44t

W( 1 4 )≈1400+44( 1 4 )=1411 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47E5@ tons

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for d 2 W d t 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BE5@

1 point is earned for the answer with reason

d 2 W d t 2 = 1 25 dW dt = 1 625 (W−300) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4BF3@ and W ≥ 1400

Therefore d 2 W d t 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BE5@ > 0 on the interval 0≤t≤ 1 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C9A@ .

The answer in part(a) is an underestimate.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for separation of variables

1 point is earned for antiderivatives

1 point is earned for constant of integration

1 point is earned for using initial condition

1 point is earned for solving for W

dW dt = 1 25 (W−300) ∫ 1 W−300 dW= ∫ 1 25 dt ln| W−300 |= 1 25 t+C ln( 1400−300 )= 1 25 (0)+C⇒ln(1100)=C W−300=1100 e 1 25 t W(t)=300+1100 e 1 25 t , 0≤t≤20 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@9E9A@
